# MTLFXSpatialScalerColorProcessingMode.perceptual

**Case**

Indicates your input and output textures use a perceptual color space.

## Declaration

```swift
case perceptual
```

## Color space modes

- **MTLFXSpatialScalerColorProcessingMode.linear**: Indicates your input and output textures use a linear color space.
- **MTLFXSpatialScalerColorProcessingMode.hdr**: Indicates your input and output textures use a high dynamic range color space.

items.description: Indicates your input and output textures use a linear color space.
